result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
8:53 AM Defendant Jeremy Edward Kuhn in court.  Attorney Jonathan Bradley Lundeen in court for Jeremy Edward Kuhn.  Attorney Lucas D Arras in court for State of Wisconsin. B. Bahr - Clerk 
21CM221, 22CM40, 22CM41, 22CT221, 22TR4260

State - plea to 3 counts. Ct 1 of 21CM221 - imposed sentence. Forf of $1,819.00 60 days jail. No Huber for 48 hours. 2 days jail credit. 24 month revocation of DL. AODA and DSP. IID. 
Ct1 and Ct 5 of 22CM41. Remaining counts of 22CM41 will be dismissed. Wheld sentence. 1 yr probation concurrent. Maintain absolute sobriety. Not be in the presence of drug para or controlled substance without valid prescription. Follow recommendations of agent. Costs of $463 each count. 2 days jail credit. DRI 22CT221 and dismiss 21TR3418, 22TR666, 22TR667, 22TR4260.  

Atty Lundeen - that is the agreement. DE will report to jail today.  DE - understands agreement.
Court - provides plea colloquy
DE - enters Guilty plea
Parties stipulate to the facts
Court - finds waiver of rights voluntary plea free & knowing & approves stips to facts. Accepts plea and finds DE guilty.
State - asks court to accept joint agreement.  Atty Lundeen - agrees court should accept joint agreement.  DE - makes a statement to the court.

Court orders -

Forf of $1,819.00 
60 days jail

2 days jail credit

Count 2,3 - DRI

22CM41

1 year probation
Concurrent to Count 5

Costs of $463.00

Count 5 -
Withheld sentence
1 year probation
Concurrent to Count 1

Court - 22CM40 amend to $500 cash.  22CM41 orders $250 cash. No possession or consumption of alcohol. Not to be in presence of drug para.
